description: Back at headquarters, Stefan Stano interrogates the just apprehended Claudio Mensina. He demands details and information on rebel activities, but Claudio refuses to cooperate. Threatened with sexual assault, the frightened prisoner wonâ€™t betray his assignment. He willingly surrenders to the punishment. Soon David Moretti joins Stefan in doling out the harsh treatment, making this drubbing pure excitement. Perhaps it was Stefanâ€™s ruse to use carnal warfare to get the criminal to talk. But Claudio still wonâ€™t squeal. He does moan a lot, but he doesnâ€™t spill the beans.
title: Basic Training, Scene #04
